testsuite.system-out:
@i9n Feature: membership As an administrator of the RGMS system I want to add, remove and modify memberships in the system.
--Output from new membership-- Scenario: new membership # Membership.feature:7 Given the system has member "usernametest" and research group "taes" # MembershipSteps.groovy:12 And the system has no membership with member "usernametest", research group "taes" between "01-03-2012" and "01-06-2012" # MembershipSteps.groovy:21 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException at java.util.Date.parse(Date.java:615) at java.util.Date.<init>(Date.java:272) at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method) at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.java:57) at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.java:45) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Constructor.java:525) at org.codehaus.groovy.reflection.CachedConstructor.invoke(CachedConstructor.java:77) at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.callsite.ConstructorSite$ConstructorSiteNoUnwrapNoCoerce.callConstructor(ConstructorSite.java:102) at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.callsite.CallSiteArray.defaultCallConstructor(CallSiteArray.java:54) at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.callsite.AbstractCallSite.callConstructor(AbstractCallSite.java:182) at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.callsite.AbstractCallSite.callConstructor(AbstractCallSite.java:190) at MembershipSteps$_run_closure2.doCall(MembershipSteps.groovy:24) at ?.And the system has no membership with member "usernametest", research group "taes" between "01-03-2012" and "01-06-2012"(Membership.feature:9)
When I create a membership with member "usernametest", research group "taes" between "01-03-2012" and "01-06-2012" # MembershipSteps.groovy:28 Then the membership with member "usernametest", research group "taes" between "01-03-2012" and "01-06-2012" is created
--Output from delete membership-- Scenario: delete membership # Membership.feature:13 Given the system has membership with member "usernametest", research group "taes" between "01-03-2012" and "01-06-2012" # MembershipSteps.groovy:39 groovy.lang.MissingPropertyException: No such property: groupname for class: MembershipSteps at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.ScriptBytecodeAdapter.unwrap(ScriptBytecodeAdapter.java:50) at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.callsite.PogoGetPropertySite.getProperty(PogoGetPropertySite.java:49) at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.callsite.AbstractCallSite.callGroovyObjectGetProperty(AbstractCallSite.java:231) at MembershipSteps$_run_closure5.doCall(MembershipSteps.groovy:43) at ?.Given the system has membership with member "usernametest", research group "taes" between "01-03-2012" and "01-06-2012"(Membership.feature:14)
